questions.question:
She rushed through _____, wore two different socks, and
somehow brushed her hair with a pen instead of a comb.

The day everything went wrong at sunshine _____
once upon a time at sunshine high school, there was a girl named mia.

Mia was smart, funny, and had a _____ that could make teachers
forgive almost anything—almost.

It all started on a _____ morning when mia’s
alarm didn’t ring.

She was
known for two things: her endless _____ and her ability to get into trouble without
even trying.
